content.rendered:
Directed by Karthik Subbaraj

Written by Karthik Subbaraj

Cast Rajinikanth (Kaali). Vijay Sethupathi (Jithu). Nawazuddin Siddiqui (Singaar Singh). M. Sasikumar (Malik). Simran (Mangalam). Trisha Krishnan (Saro). Megha Akash (Anu). J. Mahendran (Rajapandi). Vettai Muthukumar (Devaaram (as Vettai Muthu Kumar)). Bobby Simha (Michael). Guru Somasundaram (District Collector). Sananth (Anwar (as Sananth Reddy)). Malavika Mohanan (Poongodi). Y.G. Mahendran (College Principal). Munishkanth (College Mess Supervisor). Aadukalam Naren (Micheal’s Father). Chinni Jayanth (Mangalam’s Patient). Vivek Prasanna (Professor). Thennavan (Minister Thangam). Ramachandran Durairaj (Henchman (as Ramachandran)). Manikandan R. Achari (Henchman). Gajaraj (Shanmugam). Deepak Paramesh (Michael’s Friend). Shabeer Kallarakkal (Arjith). Kaalaiyan (Devaram’s Gangmember). Vaibhav Reddy (Special Appearance) . Vishal Anand (Jeetu’s Friend).Adhesh Bala. Srinivasan Elangovan (Lawyer). Zohab Khan (Arjit friend). Pankaj Kumar (Party). Pankaj Kumar (Acting Role Played and Codinator). Roju ((as Rohit Nandakumar)). Vidhu (Terror Boys Gang)

Languages Tamil

Producers Sundeep Bhardwaj. Eiqbal Jaafri. Kalanidhi Maran. Kaarthekeyen Santhanam

Production Sun Picture
